name: Softscribe Inc.
tag_list: brand-awareness, brand-marketing, brand-marketing-strategy, brand-positioning, car-rental-industry, casino-industry, communication-strategies, communication-techniques, communications-strategy, cruise-industry, eco-tour, eco-tourism, eco-tours, eco-travel
overview: Softscribe Inc is an award winning, human oriented market consulting, branding and public relations firm. We help bright people in technology companies achieve substantial business growth. Our vertical market expertise includes hospitality and travel, government, multifamily, healthcare and more. Softscribe Inc. solidifies a company’s brand awareness and can increase annual sales 20% to 25% or more. We generate the right messages for your audiences 100% of the time. This is essential to close sales. We create and leverage time saving, effective, streamlined processes. Our stellar team rises to your expectations with an average 18 years’ earned industry depth, and experience. Our invaluable clients are best-in-their-class. We are wild about them.
